src:
Munas dan Pemilihan Ketua Umum Golkar Digelar Awal Desember
05 Nov 2019, 23:04 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ketua Umum Partai Golkar Airlangga Hartarto. (CNN Indonesia/Safir Makki)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Ketua Umum DPP Partai Golkar Airlangga Hartarto resmi memutuskan jadwal penyelenggaraan Musyawarah Nasional (Munas) untuk memilih Ketua Umum Golkar periode 2019-2024 akan digelar di Jakarta pada tanggal 4-6 Desember 2019.Keputusan itu berdasarkan hasil rapat pleno Partai Golkar yang digelar di Kantor DPP Partai Golkar, Slipi, Jakarta, pada Selasa (5/11) malam."Kemudian Munasnya akan diselenggarakan tanggal 4,5,6 Desember bertempat di Jakarta," kata Airlangga.Lebih lanjut Airlangga menjelaskan Ketua Panitia Munas akan dipimpin Ketua Bappilu DPP Golkar Bagian Timur Melchias Markus Mekeng. Sementara Steering Commitee akan dipimpin Ibnu Munzir dan panitia pelaksana adalah Adies Kadir.Sebelum Munas, Airlangga mengatakan Golkar akan menggelar Rapat Pimpinan Nasional (Rapimnas) pada tanggal 14-15 Bulan November di Jakarta.Rapimnas itu, kata dia, akan dipimpin Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita sebagai Ketua Panitia. Sementara Steering Comittee akan dijabat Ibnu Munzir dan Organizing Comitte dipimpin Heru Dewanto."Nah ini [Rapimnas] nanti akan mempersiapkan materi-materi munas," kata dia. (rzr/fea)
text:
National Conference and Golkar Chairperson Election Held Early December
05 Nov 2019, 23:04 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Chairman of the Golkar Party Airlangga Hartarto. (CNN Indonesia / Safir Makki)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - General Chairperson of the Golkar Party DPP Airlangga Hartarto officially decided on the schedule for holding a National Conference to elect the Golkar Chairperson for the 2019-2024 period to be held in Jakarta on 4-6 December 2019. The decision was based on the results of the Party plenary meeting Golkar was held at the Golkar Party DPP Office, Slipi, Jakarta, on Tuesday night (5/11). "Then the National Conference will be held on December 4,5,6 in Jakarta," Airlangga said. Airlangga further explained that the Chair of the National Committee will led by the Chairman of the Golkar DPP Board of Eastern Part Melchias Markus Mekeng. While the Steering Committee will be chaired by Ibnu Munzir and the organizing committee will be Adies Kadir. Before the National Conference, Airlangga said Golkar would hold a National Leadership Meeting (Rapimnas) on November 14-15 in Jakarta. The National Commission, he said, would be led by Agus Gumiwang Kartasasmita as Chairman of the committee. While the Steering Committee will be held by Ibnu Munzir and the Organizing Committee is led by Heru Dewanto. "Now this [Rapimnas] will prepare the National Conference materials," he said. (rzr / fea)
